topic.title: How to Increase the Amount of Available Memory

body.p:
Determining how to increase the amount of memory that is allocated to depends on how you launch the application.
Windows/Linux Application Launcher - If you start using the default startup launcher that was created during a Windows or Linux installation, see .
Mac OS X Application Launcher - If you start using the default startup launcher that was created during a Mac OS X installation, see .
Command Line Script - If you start using a command line script, see .
Custom Startup Parameters File - You can also create your own custom startup parameters file and increase the memory using this file. For more information, see .
